titleStmt.title: The confession of faith, of the most reverend father in God Cyrill, Patriarch of Constantinople. Written at Constantinople, 1629. ... = Confessio fidei, reverendissimi domini Cyrilli, 1629. Patriarchæ Constantinopolitani, scripta Constantinopoli
titleStmt.author: Lucaris, Cyril, 1572-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nicolas Bourne, dwelling at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: On title page, between parallel titles: Cyrillus the Patriarch of Constantinople, to those who desire to vnderstand the religion of the Easterne Church, which is the Greeke Church, (that is to say, what wee belieue, & what wee thinke of the articles of true & right beliefe) in the name of all Christians by common consent setteth out this short confession, that it may be as a witnesse before God and the whole Church, without dissimulation, but with a good conscience.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the south entrance of the Royall Exchange
